productEmsList.title: Model
productEmsList.tooltip:
A1i: Adds advanced features, such as dual-color LED pins, multiple arrow profiles and Laser Locate™ functionality

A1i PRO: Adds advanced features, such as dual-color LED pins, multiple arrow profiles and Laser Locate™ functionality, plus adds micro-adjustable rails and quick detach for travel

A1i PRO - Hoyt®: Adds Hoyt picatinny mount adapter in addition to standard mounting hardware

productEmsList.title: Left- or Right-handed
productEmsList.tooltip: Select the correct mount or connector for your bow by choosing right-handed or left-handed

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: Xero A1i is a bow sight with a mounted digital rangefinder. Xero features include laser locate, and a one-year battery life.
seoAttributes.seoTitle: Garmin Xero® A1i Bow Sight | Bow Rangefinder
seoAttributes.title: Xero® A1i Bow Sight

seo.ogDescription: Know the range, and shoot the exact pin with minimal movement using Xero bow sights.
seo.title: Garmin Xero® A1 Bow Sight | Bow Rangefinder

010-01781-00.shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

specs.Glass lens coating: Target side is anti-reflective, water repellant and easy clean archer side is 20% reflective, water repellant and easy clean
specs.Light projection: No visible light is ever projected toward the target
specs.Operating range: -20° C (-4° F) to 60° C (140° F) with two AAA lithium batteries
specs.Pin brightness: Ambient light sensor controlled or manual

inTheBoxTab.content:
• Xero A1 bow sight (right- or left-handed depending on version selected)
  • Mount 
  • 2 screws
  • Protective bag 
  • Grip tape 
  • microUSB cable
  • Manual

010-01781-50.productVariation: Auto-ranging Digital Sight with Dual-colour LED Pins and Micro-adjustable Rails

seo.ogDescription: Xero® A1i PRO Bow Sight features fast and easy setup, auto-ranging, and line of sight feedback to take your best shot every time.
seo.title: Garmin Xero® A1i PRO | Digital Bow Sight

010-01781-50.shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

specs.Additional:
LED pins: 2 colours (red and green)
Pin diameters = 0.007″ and larger for red, 0.009″ and larger for green
Range: 90 metres to game; 275 metres to reflective targets
Operating range: -20°C (-4°F) to 60°C (140°F)
Glass lens coating: target side is anti-reflective, water repellent and easy clean; archer side is 20% reflective, water repellent and easy clean
Light projection: no visible light is ever projected toward the target
Magnification: none
Pin brightness: ambient light sensor controlled or manual
Silent Button Trigger
Microadjustable rails
Quick-detach feature
Auto-calibration
Dynamic level
Flight Apex:
Xtra Distance (XD) mode
Customisable fixed pins
Laser Locate™ feature
Multiple Arrow Profiles
Shot dynamics
Shot counter:
Compatible with Garmin GPS devices: see Compatible Devices tab
